member.name: T:BotSharp.RestApi.Dialogflow.EntitiesController
member.summary: The /entities endpoint is used to create, retrieve, update, and delete developer-defined entity objects.

member.name: M:BotSharp.RestApi.Dialogflow.QueryController.#ctor(BotSharp.Core.Engines.IBotPlatform)
member.summary: Initialize dialog controller and get a platform instance

member.name: M:BotSharp.RestApi.Dialogflow.QueryController.Query(BotSharp.RestApi.Dialogflow.QueryModel)
member.summary: The query endpoint is used to process natural language in the form of text. The query requests return structured data in JSON format with an action and parameters for that action. Both GET and POST methods return the same JSON response.

member.name: P:BotSharp.RestApi.Dialogflow.QueryModel.Contexts
member.summary: Array of additional context objects. Should be sent via a POST /query request. Contexts sent in a query are activated before the query.

member.name: P:BotSharp.RestApi.Dialogflow.QueryModel.Event
member.summary: Object containing event name and additional data. The "data" parameter can be submitted only in POST requests.

member.name: P:BotSharp.RestApi.Dialogflow.QueryModel.Lang
member.summary: Language tag, e.g., en, es etc.

member.name: P:BotSharp.RestApi.Dialogflow.QueryModel.Query
member.summary: Natural language text to be processed. Query length should not exceed 256 characters.

member.name: P:BotSharp.RestApi.Dialogflow.QueryModel.SessionId
member.summary: A string token up to 36 symbols long, used to identify the client and to manage session parameters (including contexts) per client.

member.name: P:BotSharp.RestApi.Dialogflow.QueryModel.Timezone
member.summary: Time zone from IANA Time Zone Database Examples: America/New_York, Europe/Paris

member.name: T:BotSharp.RestApi.Rasa.TrainController
member.summary: You can post your training data to this endpoint to train a new model for a project. This request will wait for the server answer: either the model was trained successfully or the training exited with an error.
